templates.title: CRM
templates.description: CRM application with adminer. Using traefikv2 rProxy (should be preinstaled on your docker platform).
templates.name: crm

env.name: STACKNAME
env.label: Unique name (or ID) of this stack
env.description: It is used as name for database, traefik, etc. String with lowecase letters, digits and underscores. It must not contain spaces, dashes etc.

env.name: PHP_VERSION
env.label: PHP version
env.description: Version of the PHP used in the containers.

env.name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
env.label: MariaDB password.
env.description: Password for the $STACKNAME database user.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_LATEST_BUILD
env.label: Download latest build?
env.description: Download latest build and make update when init container starts. Should be yes for first start of the stack.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_URL
env.label: Download URL
env.description: URL where can be app build downloaded.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_USERNAME
env.label: Download username
env.description: Username for download build.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_PASSWORD
env.label: Download password
env.description: Password for download build.

env.name: APP_URL
env.label: Application URL
env.description: Domain name without http:// or https://

env.name: APP_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: ADMINER_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Adminer allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: APP_VOLUME_SHARED
env.label: App shared volume
env.description: Volume or bind mount for application's 'shared' folder. It is recommended to use bind mount to the host filesystem.
